title: Win a holiday in Kefalonia, Greece
text: Immortalised on screen in the Hollywood blockbuster Captain Corelli's Mandolin , Kefalonia – the largest of the Ionian Islands – is one of the most attractive destinations in Europe. Crammed with magnificent sights, the island offers amazing beaches, rich cultural heritage, great monuments, mountains, castles, remote monasteries and cheerful, hospitable people. From the neoclassical buildings, museums and gardens of the capital, Argostoli, to the tree-clad slopes of mighty Mount Ainos, sprawling vineyards and pristine beaches that fringe the coastline, Kefalonia is one of the finest gems in the crown of the Greek tourist industry. The prize includes : • Return economy-class flights from London Gatwick Airport or Manchester Airport to Kefalonia Airport. • Seven nights' accommodation in a two- to three-star self-catered studio or apartment. • Return transfers from Kefalonia Airport to the accommodation. To be in with a chance to win this superb holiday, courtesy of Sunvil, just answer the simple question and enter your details in the form below by midnight on 30 October, 2015.
